name: Flower Power
description:
Controls:


Quit Game - Esc or Select.

Controller:
left stick - move character
Right Stick - control camera
bottom face button - jump
left face button - release seeds & positive energy.

Keyboard:
WSAD - Movement
Mouse - Camera control
Space - Jump
E - release seeds & positive energy

Credits

Zoe Blackwell - Music

Steve Clark - Programming / TA (steveclark3d.com) @GameDevSteve
